questions.question_text: How do you configure the Message of the Day in an ACI environment?

choices.B: In the APIC GUI, go to System/Controllers/Controller Policies and set banner #Welcome to APIC#

discussion.content:
Answer D
 
aaa banner text

Example:
apic1(config)# aaa banner 'Welcome to APIC'

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/switches/datacenter/aci/apic/sw/1-x/cli/nx/cfg/b_APIC_NXOS_CLI_User_Guide/b_APIC_NXOS_CLI_User_Guide_chapter_01110.html

choices.E: Assign a contract as "Provider Contract" in DB-EPG.
choices.A: Create an external network under L3Out. Add subnet 10.10.10.0/16 with scope "External Subnets for the External EPG"
choices.B: Assign a contract as "Consumer Contract" in an external network under L2Out.
choices.D: Create an EPG and name it "VPN-Access". Create a bridge domain with subnet 10.10.10.1/16 and associate it with "VPN-Access" EPG. Create a contract as "Provider Contract" in EPG.
choices.C: Create an EPG and name it "VPN-Access". Create a bridge domain with subnet 10.10.10.0/16 and associate it with "VPN-Access" EPG. Create a contract as "Provider Contract" in EPG.

discussion.content: I am for AE as well

questions.question_text: Which three functional roles of the container networking interface in CNCF reference architecture are true? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
I think this is BEF. CNI is all about Cloud Native Networking. 
B. provides information of network namespace
E. networking and IPAM
F. provides container create/delete events >>> For networking I believe

See Page 21 of the slideshow : https://www.slideshare.net/caniszczyk/cloud-native-landscape-cncf-and-oci
CNI is on Runtime, not the others...
